title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare Wiki Guide
content: Welcome to IGN's Call of Duty: Modern Warfare Wiki Guide which covers everything from Tips, Tricks, Weapon Strategie

title: Modern Warfare Multiplayer Tips and Tricks
content: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare's Multiplayer brings a lot of changes to the long-running franchise.

title: Multiplayer Tips and Tricks
content: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare is finally out and it brings a lot of changes to the franchise's staple multiplayer offerings.

title: Multiplayer Weapon Class Tips and Tricks
content: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare offers up seven unique weapon classes for players to use.

title: Multiplayer Maps Tips and Tricks
content: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare features dozens of maps, each with variants and more.

title: Multiplayer
content: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare marks a return to Infinity Ward's roots which helped put the series on the map with their original Modern Warfare.

title: Maps
content: Modern Warfare has a lot of maps and unlike previous games that followed a three-lane design to keep the action tight and constant, the maps in this iteration of Call of Duty vary greatly.

title: Weapons
content: There are 29 primary weapons and 10 secondary weapons in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare and each weapon feels unique.

title: Lethal and Tactical Grenades
content: Lethal and Tactical grenades are your best friends when you get into sticky situations in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare's multiplayer.

title: Optics and Attachments
content: Optics and Attachments are key to making a weapon feel truly yours in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare.

title: Perks
content: Perks are an essential asset of every loadout in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare.

title: Modes
content: There are over a dozen modes in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare when you take into account Hardcore variants.

title: Operators
content: Operators in Modern Warfare replace Black Ops 4's Specialists but they're not exactly the same.

title: Best Guns
content: There are dozens of guns to choose from in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare and finding the right one can be quite overwhelming.

title: How To Guides
content: Whether you're new to Call of Duty or a veteran of the series, it's been over a year since a new game in the franchise has come out and you might be a tad rusty.

title: How to Play Ground War
content: Ground War is a new large-scale game mode for the Call of Duty franchise and it’s very similar to Call of Duty WWII’s War mode.

title: How to Play Cross Play
content: Cross Play is live in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare which means players on differing consoles and systems can play together despite boundaries that would have prevented this from happening in the past.

title: How to Use Field Upgrades
content: Field Upgrades give players an extra edge on the battlefield and are essential to taking home a win.

title: How to Do Finishing Moves
content: Finishing Moves are powerful melee attacks that not only kill the enemy but do so in an extremely flashy way.

title: How to Use Blueprints
content: Blueprints are unlockable variants of weapons in Modern Warfare and they come in four different levels of rarity: common, rare, epic and legendary.

title: How to Play Hardcore
content: Hardcore is a staple of Call of Duty and naturally, it's made a return in this year's iteration, Modern Warfare.

title: How to Get a Watch
content: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare allows you to take customization one step further in the form of watches that your Operator of choice wears on their left arm.

title: How to Create the Best M4A1 Class
content: If you've got your ear to the ground on anything Call of Duty: Modern Warfare, you've likely heard about the M4A1. It's the third assault rifle unlocked in that class of weapons and it's unlocked quite early.

title: How to Get to Max Level
content: Getting to the max level in any Call of Duty game is an honorable goal and Call of Duty: Modern Warfare is no different.

title: How to Prestige
content: In the Call of Duty series, after reaching the max level, the game will present to you an option to essentially start over by going Prestige.

title: How to Play Each Multiplayer Mode
content: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare brings back some of the series' most classic modes as well as a handful of brand new modes.

title: How to Customize Operators
content: Gone are the Specialists of Black Ops 4 and in their place are customizable Operators.

title: How to Create a Class
content: Creating a Class in Modern Warfare is key to making the experience feel unique to your play style.

title: How to Use Attachments
content: Attachments in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare are your key to making your weapon feel like yours exclusively.

title: How to Use Vehicles
content: Vehicles have woven their way in and out of the Call of Duty franchise with every iteration and in Modern Warfare, they've returned.

title: How to Use Killstreaks
content: Killstreaks are designed to give you an extra edge on the battlefield as a reward for consistent kills without deaths in between.

title: How to Level Up Fast
content: There are three main ways to level up fast in Modern Warfare multiplayer killing enemies, playing Domination and other objective-based modes, and completing challenges.

title: How to Unlock Charms
content: One of the many customization options available in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare is its Charms, which you can attach to your weapons.

title: How to Get 2XP Tokens
content: Throughout your multiplayer journey in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare, you'll be earning lots of XP for getting kills, completing objectives, and Challenges.

title: How to Use 2XP Tokens
content: In Call of Duty: Modern Warfare, 2XP Tokens are a great way to earn experience at twice the rate as you normally would.

title: How to Play Night Maps
content: A fan-favorite feature in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare is the ability to play its night maps, which are nighttime versions of the game's regular multiplayer maps.

title: How to Change Your Name in Modern Warfare
content: While it is possible to change your name on PC, Xbox Live or on the PlayStation Network, doing so isn't necessary to change your in-game name in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare.

title: How to Get XRK M4
content: The XRK M4 is one of the best guns in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare because it's a powerful variant of one of the game's best weapons.

title: Spec Ops Walkthrough and Guide
content: This Spec Ops (Special Ops) guide will walk you through each of the game's 4-player co-op missions with tips and tricks to get by as successfully as possible.

title: How to Beat Spec Ops: Operation Headhunter
content: Operation Headhunter is the first Special Ops (Spec Ops) mission in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare.

title: How to Beat Spec Ops: Operation Kuvalda
content: Operation Kuvalda is the second Special Ops mission in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare. Your goal is to assault Almalik's base of operations and mark his weapons for airstrike.

title: How to Beat Spec Ops: Operation Paladin
content: Operation Paladin is the third Special Ops mission in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare. Your goal is to go behind enemy lines, extract Dr. Linda Morales, and use her intel to hunt down Mr Z

title: How to Beat Spec Ops: Operation Crosswind
content: Operation Crosswind is the fourth Special Ops mission in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare. Your goal is to infiltrate the AQ-occupied Verdansk Airport, board the hijacked 747, and recover its cargo.
